title: vegan cinnamon apple scone recipe
directions: In a large bowl, mix together the flour, coconut oil, honey, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, salt and milk. Add the chopped apples to the mixture and stir until well-combined. Knead the dough together into about a one-inch thick circle. Using a knife, cut about 10 wedges (triangles). Place the wedges on a baking pan about ½ inch apart and bake them for about 15 to 18 minutes.
ingredients: ¼ cup milk of your choice
